product_name: SeaBear Heat and Serve Wild Salmon Meal
long_description: Each SeaBear Heat and Serve Wild Salmon meal is a simple, tasty mix of natural ingredients for healthy eating. With no refrigeration required and a shelf life of four years, it's great for camping. To reheat, drop the pouch into boiling water for 2 - 3 min. or tear open the pouch 2 in. at the notch and microwave on high for 60 sec. Enjoy straight out of the pouch, or serve over pasta, rice or risotto. Tomato Basil flavor has wild salmon with tomato, basil, olive oil and garlic; Mediterranean flavor has wild salmon with green olive, Roma tomato, garlic, olive oil and spices. 100% pure, natural wild salmon.
short_description: Each SeaBear Heat and Serve Wild Salmon meal is a simple, tasty mix of natural ingredients for healthy eating. With no refrigeration required and a shelf life of four years, it's great for camping.
